creator: peter.illes@ivata.com
text:
The forEach tag is wrong when iterating in 'fixed number of times' mode. When
'begin' parameter equals the 'end' parameter, it doesn't evaluate at all. When
'end' is 'begin' + 1, it iterates twice as should iterate towards 'end' inclusive.
This means it's not possible to iterate once.

I can't replicate the problem. Consider the following examples: Loop!
Loop!
For me, the first loop executes once, and the second executes twice. If you're still having a problem, please be more specific; post an entire page of input and output, and specify the container that you're running in.
creator: bayern@essentially.net
